incidents.title: Suspicious Activity
incidents.description: Report of individuals loitering around the neighborhood park after midnight. Please investigate.

incidents.title: Street Light Outage
incidents.description: Street light on Elm Street not working. It's causing a dark area, and residents feel unsafe. Needs urgent attention.

incidents.title: Lost Pet
incidents.description: A resident has lost their cat named Whiskers. If found, please contact the owner at xxx-xxx-xxxx.

incidents.title: Loud Noise Complaint
incidents.description: Complaint about loud music and party noise from a house on Maple Avenue. Disturbing the neighborhood peace.

incidents.title: Vandalism Report
incidents.description: Vandalism incident at the local community center. Graffiti found on the exterior walls. Authorities notified.

incidents.title: Suspicious Vehicle
incidents.description: A suspicious vehicle has been parked near the community center for an extended period. Requesting investigation.

servicerequest.title: Street Cleaning Request
servicerequest.description: Requesting street cleaning on Oak Street. There is a lot of litter and debris that needs to be cleared.

servicerequest.title: Pothole Repair
servicerequest.description: Report of a large pothole on Main Street. It's causing inconvenience to drivers. Please repair as soon as possible.

servicerequest.title: Tree Trimming
servicerequest.description: Tree branches near power lines on Pine Street need trimming to prevent potential hazards. Requesting tree maintenance.

servicerequest.title: Sidewalk Repair
servicerequest.description: The sidewalk on Elm Avenue is damaged, posing a tripping hazard. Requesting repairs for safety reasons.

servicerequest.title: Garbage Pickup Request
servicerequest.description: Garbage pickup was missed on Birch Lane. Bins are full, and residents need prompt collection to maintain cleanliness.

servicerequest.title: Traffic Signal Malfunction
servicerequest.description: The traffic signal at the intersection of Maple and Oak Streets is malfunctioning. Vehicles are experiencing delays.

servicerequest.title: Dog Park Maintenance
servicerequest.description: Maintenance required at the local dog park. Repairing damaged fences and ensuring a safe environment for pets and owners.
